Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 1 Tika, Hetuduka » 1.1 Kusalattika, Hetuduka » 1.1.1 Hetupada » 1.1.1.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
Tika, Hetuduka
Kusalattika, Hetuduka
Hetupada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
1.
2Kusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
3Akusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
4Abyākataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
2.
5Kusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
6Akusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
7Abyākataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
3.
8Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
